amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute adds a new title to the bill titled, "ILLINOIS AND MICHIGAN CANAL NATIONAL HERITAGE CORRIDOR ACT AMENDMENTS.".
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Pombo.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
